Text: RE Transaction UpdateFYIJust heard that all NFL games will be cancelled this weekend Jerry D Spottswood ISSG MarketingLaunch Support Programs ISSG Divisional Marketing Phone Pager email Original Message From Kevin mailto Sent Thursday September AM To Ty Servello Steve Neu Sean Brogden Mike Deluke Michael Currie Spottswood Jerry Jeff Ullrich Jeff Smith Grant Johnson Dutch Quigley Dan Wienserski Chris Kiske Work Chris Kiske Home Calvin Mathis BJ Naman Gary Turner Subject Transaction Update In response to the infamous McNairgate Any player that is dropped from a team will be frozen from being acquired until the following weeks transactions begin Kevin

RE Franchise PlayersHey did you ever respond back to Ty message about the expansion team issue Looks like my original counterpart has decided to pass on participating this year and I dont have enough time to do it on my own Ive already met with Ty and were planning to team together this year because were both in the same situation However that means youve now got an open spot were you planning to fill it with another team Jody Original Message From Kevin mailto Sent Tuesday September PM To Andy Reynolds BJ Naman Chris Kiske Home Dan Wienserski Dutch Quigley Grant Johnson Jeff Smith Email Jeff Ullrich Spottswood Jerry Michael Currie Mike Deluke Ty Servello Subject Franchise Players The draft is almost here I will be sending out directions either today or sometime tomorrow on how to get there It is this Saturday at am If you are keeping a franchise player I need a name now If we do not hear anything by tomorrow then we will assume none will be kept So far the list of franchise players are Michael Deluke Marshall Faulk Jeff Ullrich Kurt Warner Michael Currie Edgerrian James That is it Let me know Later Kevin
